dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your central hub for workflow management and insights
dashboard.myAssignedTasksDescription: View and manage tasks assigned to you across all workflows
dashboard.myReusableWorkflowsDescription: Start new instances of your reusable workflow templates
dashboard.mySavedWorkflowsDescription: View and edit workflows you've created
dashboard.allSavedWorkflowsDescription: View and manage all workflows in the organization
dashboard.welcomeMessage: You can view your assigned tasks and start reusable workflows here. Contact your administrator for workflow creation access.
dashboard.reusableWorkflowsInfo: Reusable workflows allow you to start new instances of predefined workflow templates
dashboard.createFirstWorkflow: Create your first workflow to get started
dashboard.workflowsMovedDescription: Reusable workflows are now managed in the 'My Reusable Workflows' section above.

workflow.launchError: Failed to launch workflow. Please try again.
workflow.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this workflow?

reports.title: Analytics & Reports
reports.description: Comprehensive insights into your workflow performance and team productivity

overview.trendsDescription: Daily workflow creation and completion patterns
overview.performanceDescription: Key performance indicators and completion rates

workflows.performanceDescription: Detailed breakdown of individual workflow progress and efficiency

users.performanceDescription: Individual team member productivity and completion statistics

workflowBuilder.title: Workflow Builder
workflowBuilder.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop steps to build your workflow

steps.formSubmittedDesc: Triggers when a form is submitted by a user
steps.scheduleDesc: Triggers at specified times or intervals
steps.webhookDesc: Triggers when a webhook is received
steps.recordCreatedDesc: Triggers when a new record is created in the database
steps.sendEmailDesc: Sends an email to specified recipients
steps.updateRecordDesc: Updates existing records in the database
steps.sendNotificationDesc: Sends notifications to users or systems
steps.createTaskDesc: Creates a new task and assigns it to users
steps.ifConditionDesc: Branches workflow based on conditional logic
steps.filterDesc: Filters data based on specified criteria
steps.switchCaseDesc: Routes workflow based on multiple conditions
steps.waitDesc: Pauses workflow execution for a specified duration
steps.webhookCallDesc: Makes an HTTP request to an external service
steps.delayDesc: Delays execution for a specified time period
steps.errorHandlerDesc: Handles errors and exceptions in the workflow
